img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 78.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Wukong_Sandgate_78.jpg)
On the other side, you’ll encounter a very strong Swift Bat. These enemies can dash at you very fast with their powerful swings to hit hard, or hit you from a distance with waves of force. This one in particular is stronger than the rest because after defeating it, you’ll gain the Swift Bat Spirit.
img_below_text:
A doorway to the right leads outside, but before you exit be sure to look for a barricaded doorway across from the crack in the wall that you can knock down. The outer cave here is full of debris, and two more Swift Bats to contend with.
![Wukong Sandgate 80.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/27/Wukong_Sandgate_80.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

On the other side, you’ll encounter a very strong Swift Bat. These enemies can dash at you very fast with their powerful swings to hit hard, or hit you from a distance with waves of force. This one in particular is stronger than the rest because after defeating it, you’ll gain the Swift Bat Spirit."
            - Following Text: "A doorway to the right leads outside, but before you exit be sure to look for a barricaded doorway across from the crack in the wall that you can knock down. The outer cave here is full of debris, and two more Swift Bats to contend with.
![Wukong Sandgate 80.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/27/Wukong_Sandgate_80.jpg)"

            Your task:

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, cavernous area with stalactites and stalagmites, illuminated by light filtering through openings in the cave. A character, likely the player, is seen moving through the cave, suggesting exploration or an impending encounter. This scene sets the stage for a challenging battle with a strong Swift Bat, as mentioned in the preceding text, and hints at further exploration opportunities and additional enemies in the following text. The image serves to visually immerse the player in the game's environment and narrative progression.
